name: Patato Man
description:
From one day to another, your head turned into a patato (sic)! Because you are Patrick Atom, a creative chemist, you made a facial antidote. But when you were heating water for blending the antidote  to strenghten its effects, the bees stoled it! So, you must get it back before your head starts to ferment. Hurry up!

CONTROLS:

Left and right buttons - Walk

Down button - Duck

A Button (Z key by default) - Start, use item

B Button (X key by default) - Jump

NOTE:

Also, you can play it here.
